text: |} The Gala Stakes is a Listed flat horse race in Great Britain open to horses aged three years and over. It is run at Sandown Park over a distance of 1 mile 1 furlongs and 209 yards (2,002 metres), and it is scheduled to take place each year in July. The race was first run in 2002. ==Records== Leading jockey since 2002 (3 wins): * Richard Hills – Izdiham (2002), Ikhtyar (2003), David Junior (2005) Leading trainer since 2002 (3 wins): * Saeed bin Suroor – Kirklees (2009), Windhoek (2014), Tha'ir (2015) ==Winners== {| class = "sortable" | border="1" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:90%" |- bgcolor="#77dd77" align="center" !
